title.rendered: Avalon Labs Explores First Bitcoin-Backed Public Debt Fund

content.rendered: Avalon Labs is evaluating the launch of a bitcoin-backed public debt fund, exploring its alignment with SEC Regulation A. U.S. SEC Framework Could Provide Structure for Bitcoin-Backed Debt Fund Avalon Labs is pioneering efforts to expand bitcoin’s role in the financial sector by exploring a regulated bitcoin-backed public debt fund. According to a post on […]

According to a post on […]
